name: Diversion For Kids
description:
Like platform games? Like running games? Well, you're gonna luv Diversion for Kids: 200+ levels, 7 Worlds, 700+ characters - one touch and no ads or IAP!!

- No ads, no IAP
- Millions of players world-wide
- 220 Levels of platform running action
- 7 Unique Worlds
- 700+ fully-animated playable characters to unlock and collect
- Boss battles!
- Physics powered by PhysX
- Game Center achievements and leaderboards
- 3rd person camera: see all the action
- Different every time you play
- HD graphics
- Play your own music
- Bluetooth game controller support
- Save all your game progress, gems and unlocked characters to iCloud

HOVER WORLD PREVIEW LEVEL!!! Cruise around on your hover board collecting gems, or jump off and run around in this free roaming world!

Be amazed at what you can do : run, jump, climb, hang, swim, zip, slide, and even fly! As you progress through levels you'll unlock more challenging gameplay and hazards, including: spikes, chasms, zip-lines, slides, ledges, holes, buttons, spiderbots, bouncer bombs, water, laser walls, meteors, security drones, aliens, mutant sharks, chompers, stompers, lava, steam vents, blast vents, reversers, stoppers, portals, spike rollers, and more! 205 challenging levels will require timing and puzzle solving skills to complete and unlock the hundreds of playable characters including: Ninja, Alien, Rocket, Karate, Robo, 60s, Zombie, Burglar, Tiger, Egyptian and even the Freaky Chicken and Future Banana!

Will this be your next Diversion?

Note: 'Diversion for Kids' is the same as our free game 'Diversion', except there are no in-app purchases, no ads, and no external links for an uncluttered gaming experience. You can even use iCloud to save progress between Diversion and Diversion for Kids.
